xmrpeers 0.2.4
  • Reference

Export txpool archive to CSV

txpool.export.Rd

Exports transaction and block arrival times from a database file to a CSV file. Must use txpool.init and txpool.collect first. txpool.export can be used while txpool.collect is still running in a separate R session.

Usage

txpool.export(
  db.file = "xmr-txpool-archive.db",
  csv.filepath = "",
  begin.date = "1970-01-01",
  end.date = "2035-01-01"
)

Arguments

db.file

File name/path of the txpool archive database.

csv.filepath

File path of CSV file that will be created. Leave default to save in current working directory.

begin.date

Optional argument to restrict data export date range. Use "YYYY-MM-DD" format.

end.date

Optional argument to restrict data export date range. Use "YYYY-MM-DD" format.

Value

NULL (invisible)

See also

txpool.init, which create the database file and txpool.collect, which collects txpool data and saves it to the database file.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
txpool.export()
} # }
